name: places/ChIJDYa1glVZwokRjw78ECP7LVc
formattedAddress: 7 E 44th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 E 44th St, New York, NY 10017-3607, USA

originalText.text:
Hidden Gem!
I stumbled upon this store on the way to Grand Central..I started browsing & was gently approached by the striking Sales Associate Art who made me feel like a Lady helping me mix & match.

To my Surprise I then received VIP treatment from Salvatore who passionately whipped an outfit together noting my grÃ¡ for red. His knowledge was like something Iâ€™ve NEVER EVER experienced in my 20 + years of shopping in NY.I had a personal shopping appointment for a special occasion booked some time back & it hasnâ€™t a look in on Mad Under..

Salvatore  unknown to himself portrayed his knowledge of Fabric in such a manner that made me think twice. I often felt the weight when trying on a coat for warmth.He explained the difference between wool & cashmere I understood after wearing for a while how this exquisite weightless coat warmed me up quickly.

He paired a coat for me with a bag & pointed out the stitching &  tailored detail compared to one I had my eye on. I had no intention to shop didnâ€™t know where Iâ€™d stumbled into but was made feel like a Woman wearing something especially tailored for me.

After hearing it was a milestone Birthday he offered a Complimentary silk scarf to my purchase.
As I said I had no intention of shopping I came back today to purchase.

Everything was packed away Beautifully & neatly.I was greeted at the door again by the Beautiful Man from Morocco who shared his passion for design &  flowy fabrics  from his native home which in his opinion was an inspiration to one of the designers in the storeâ€¦

Iâ€™ve shopped at all the Outlets looking for bargain s just for the sake of a label but the older & wiser I am as I explained to Art less in the label department is more for me nowâ€¦

Iâ€™ve been so let down not experiencing endorphins being released after a high from shopping because I felt seeing theses expensive labels hitting the floors ,stomped on & on wiry hangers making me question itâ€™s worth!!

My mind & eyes have experienced a new Awakening!!!

I have in fact found a Fabulous New place to shop and be transported to the days when clothing was respected to the days of Jackie O.

The only regret I have is feeling a bit embarrassed as I thought it was a typical outlet & didnâ€™t realize I was in the Company of Elite Fashion personal.

When in fact I experienced conversation with three wonderful men over the past 2 visits each portrayed their joy for being a part of this Wonderful service to Fashion .

originalText.text: Came in here with my boyfriend and he ended up walking out with the most beautiful wallet at SUCH a fair price! The employees were so helpful and overall really pleasantâ€”I certainly recommended this place for luxury shopping of any kind!
